name: MADE WITH LOVE IN PHILADELPHIA BADGE
tagline: For Philadelphia based startups to let the world know
body:
### ABOUT THE BADGE
After some extensive searching I couldn't find any type of 'made in philly' badge. These seemed silly so I built one for the launch of [salesbox.io](salesbox.io).

Now I'd love for anyone else interested to use it as well. Perhaps down the road I'll build out a little site where all Philly startups can best listed.

### Authors and Contributors
Design by @trevorgeise

### Support or Contact
Contact @trevorgeise
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
